Topic.Title: ,,,,,,,and don't forget f faces.......................Obama beat Romn by a LARGER % of pop vote

Message.Msg: Obama won a majority of 50.5% (about 600,000 voters.) The Libertarians (and others) got 1.5% and Romney got 48%. In an election where Obama was the incumbent (and incumbents usually win) and 7 million registered Democrats did not vote and 3 million registered Republicans did not vote. I think everybody is overstating the long term demographic trends here.

Message.Title: Obama beat romn by almost 3% 3% of 122 million is almost 4 million not 600k you stinking f face
Message.Msg: In total, about 122 million people voted in this year's election. Barack Obama won about 50.6 percent of their votes, or just under 61 million. Mitt Romney won about 47.8 percent of the vote, just under 58 million, but Obama's margin could grow to more than 3 percent once all the votes are in.

Message.Msg: First he says, lets all get along. Sure, why not be pals with a raving mad, liberal goon.

Rarely, but somtimes these "liberals" do see the light. I talked to a young man years ago whose father ran a small local newspaper. His dad was a flaming red "liberal". Pat Brown, Gov. of California at the time rewarded the father by giving him a state bank charter. (Another "liberal" bankster bleeding workers with usury) I think this young man began to get an inkling of what it really was all about. I was very sad to hear that while traveling abroad in Turkey he got caught with some Marijuana. I don't know what they did to him but they are very harsh. I blame the dad as much as the young guy. "Anything goes" with most of the "liberal" bent and the boy was caught up in that type of teaching.
